ygData.subject: RE: Rules and FAQ 1.6 - PLEASE READ THIS!
ygData.msgSnippet: If something like this were to actually make it into the game (which I doubt) I d bet Verant would balance it by making every mob in the affected zone aggro on
ygData.messageBody:
If something like this were to actually make it into the game (which I
doubt) I'd bet Verant would balance it by making every mob in the affected
zone aggro on the bard after the effect wears off.


Elwyn

-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
[mailto:Michael.Garramone@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 05, 2000 6:58 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Rules and FAQ 1.6 - PLEASE READ THIS!


my god, /drool. talk about giving the gater "time" to evac.

Shada

> One song, deemed L75 or so, was a song that stopped
> time in a zone. Every second of time stop drained mana, but in
> the duration, all NPCs would freeze. Man, that would rock.
>
> Harm.
